original_text: I clothed you also with embroidered cloth and shod you with fine leather. I wrapped you in fine linen and covered you with silk.
korean_text: 수 놓은 옷을 입히고 물돼지 가죽신을 신기고 가는 베로 두르고 모시로 덧입히고

sentences.original_text: I clothed you also with embroidered cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 또한 너를 수놓은 천으로 입혔주었네.

sentences.original_text: and shod you with fine leather
I wrapped you in fine linen
